long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Just enter the number of questions, and press start.

Works for all Spanish verb tenses in the Conjuguemos library. 

NOTE: The extension will not work with custom teacher-created activities.

(New!) Version 2.1 can save scores automatically and get some questions wrong if desired.
